Name: NoWaitHero
About the game: Deck building card battle 'NoWaitHero' There is no need to wait during a duel. Seize the victory ahead of the choice. In this game, you don't have to wait for the enemy to act. They act at the same time as each other. There is no need to wait for the other party. The enemy's movements are predictable, so let's get ahead of them. You can get new cards by defeating enemies. Cards are stacked and only the top card can be used. The choice you make will make a big difference in the battle.ã€€ Build up your cards and experience to take on more formidable enemies. The card has restrictions on use. If you use it crudely, you'll be pushed into a corner. The enemy is also a hero. Use it all to your advantage and win in style! You are the one who will defeat all the heroes and win the Hero Royal.
